Articles.Content:
Recently with the mod Near, the game causes my aircrafts to call upon the kraken.Here's an example of what happens =

![2BVOkSX.png](http://i.imgur.com/2BVOkSX.png)

![b28hySW.png](http://i.imgur.com/b28hySW.png)

![HDnFgDc.png](http://i.imgur.com/HDnFgDc.png)

![6pRgb6o.png](http://i.imgur.com/6pRgb6o.png)

By removing NEAR the kraken ignores me.

Not sure if its a conflict between mods or just a glitch.
